item.description: Things to be done on the Discord/needs deciding on: Regarding these things, I won’t implement them until we have a clear idea of what we want and a solid baseline for the idea. Community values: Status: WIP This one is more for me to write up properly, but I’ll put it here anyhow, since I do want others' opinions on this! What values does this community have regarding role-play in PSO2NGS?

The Patrons Details: Alliance Name: The Patrons Ship: 03 - Thorn We usually hangs out on Block 26! Alliance Type: Roleplay Alliance Time Zone: CEST About: Most of us are very gay. üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà Members: Nora Honora (Leader) Equinox Lilit Gaia Stellaria Gogo Mes

Characters: From The Patrons : Nora Honora (Leader) Equinox Lilit Lichenaes Gaia Stellaria Gogo Mes Unaffiliated (that I know of, @ me if you want anything changed): RO-C Yokai (to be written) Yumesaki (to be written) Meteor Molly (to be written) Sophia Lorre (to be written) Haraki (to be written)

Equinox Details: Name: Equinox Nickname: Light or Nox Race: Deuman/Kitsune Hybrid Height: 170cms Age: 23 years old Gender: Woman Occupation/Archetype: Operative - Healer, Assassin Pronouns: She/They Personality: Equinox shows basic emotion around others while her Light Personality is in control and finds it incredibly difficult to trust people other than Nox(Dark Personality) and she rather that she keep to herself so that past events don‚Äôt repeat themselves.

Gaia Stellaria ‘‘I don’t know what I am doing, just making stuff up as I go and I am pretty good at that.'' Details: Name: Tianea ‘Gaia’ Stellaria Race: Self gene-spliced Newman Height: 180 cms Age: 30 years old (as of episode 5) Gender: Woman Occupation/Archetype: Explorer, Scientist, Engineer, Recon Weaponry: Generally equipped with a prototype she made herself. Often a form of ranged weapon or knuckle weapons.

Gogo Mes “If you have an issue with something, you can count on me!” Details: Name: Gogo Mes Race: Raptor Height: 168 cms Age: 20 years old Gender: Woman Occupation: Guard on home planet. Weaponry: Dual-wielding guns. Pronouns: She/They Personality: Insert personality here. Background: She’s the girlfriend of Lilit . Artworks: All artworks above are made by Mantispray (Twitter)

Lady Lilit Lichenaes of Atlantis and Mercia III ‘‘You don’t wanna know what I did to get these legs." (You really don’t wanna know…) Details: Name: Lilit Lichenaes Race: Fish person Height: 200 cms Age: Several hundreds of years, but visually and mentally between 22-24. (Fish people age slowly) Gender: Woman Occupation/Archetype: Heir to the throne Weaponry: Ice rod or bow. She likes it ranged.

Nora Honora “Did someone say fire? No…? …must’ve misheard tea - coming up!~” Details: Name: Nora Honora Race: Gene-spliced Deuman (Deuman-cat mix) Height: 155 cms Age: 17 years old Gender: Woman Occupation/Archetype: Waitress (retconned till further notice), ARKs defender, Ranger/gunner Pronouns: She/They (But doesn’t mind anything else) Personality: Nora could be characterized as a plethora of things; many would say that she’s a neurotic piece of work that is crude, mischievous and snarky.

RO-C (Rosie) “–” Details: Name: Rosie Clements Race: Cast Height: 154 cms Age: 13 years old Gender: Woman Occupation/Archetype: Student, civilian Pronouns: She/They Personality: Rosie is a reserved young girl who yearns to see the world beyond the walls of Central City. She can be described as a dreamer at heart, she tries to learn as much about Halpha through various recorded media and the stories and exploits of the ARKS defenders that she meets.
Meteorns Please… somebody… write… Characters who are Meteorns: Nora Equinox Gaia Stellaria Gogo Mes Lilit Lichenaes

RP-Logs If there are any typos or errors, feel free to send a message in #log-submission if there are any issues. Current logs that have been organized: First interactions: Lilit and RO-C’s First Interaction (Featuring Nora ~) Submitted logs
Submitted Logs: Feel free to send in ‘valuable’ submissions in #log-submission on the Discord! No logs submitted.
Central City Insert content here. Logs! Lilit and Rosie’s First Interaction
Halpha Logs in this place: Most of the logs
